name: Pet of the Week – Blu Star
description: Meet Blu Star, this week's Pet of the Week! Blu Star is a big boy who loves to run around in open outdoor spaces and will require a fair amount of brushing to keep his beautiful coat in tip top shape.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet Blu Star, this week’s Pet of the Week! Blu Star is a big boy who loves to run around in open outdoor spaces and will require a fair amount of brushing to keep his beautiful coat in tip top shape. If you’re interested in adopting Blu Star, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
